metadata.keywords: SOGAT, Industrial Projects, Engineering, Construction, Project Management

hero.title: SOGAT, PARTNER OF YOUR INDUSTRIAL PROJECTS
hero.description: We support you throughout all construction project phases and offer our expertise to make your project a success with passion.

expertise.title: Our Expertise & History
expertise.subtitle: More than a promise, our services are certified "Service France Garanti" by AFNOR

cta.title: Want to join a young and dynamic team?

footer.description: Expert in construction project management and digital modeling

metiers.title: Our Professions
metiers.description: We specialize in various professional domains, offering expertise across multiple sectors. Our team consists of highly qualified professionals who bring years of experience and deep industry knowledge to every project.

sermas.title: SERMAS
sermas.description: SERMAS specializes in industrial automation and robotics solutions, providing cutting-edge technology for manufacturing processes.

sp2i-ferroviaire.title: SP2I Ferroviaire
sp2i-ferroviaire.description: SP2I Ferroviaire delivers specialized solutions for the railway industry, focusing on safety and efficiency in rail transport systems.

sp2i-prehension.title: SP2I Préhension
sp2i-prehension.description: SP2I Préhension develops advanced gripping and handling systems for industrial applications, optimizing production processes.

aretec.title: ARETEC
aretec.description: ARETEC provides technical expertise in industrial maintenance and engineering, ensuring optimal performance of industrial equipment.

tracip.title: TRACIP
tracip.description: TRACIP specializes in digital forensics and data recovery, offering secure and reliable solutions for digital investigations.
